title: Easy Rice Pudding
method: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Coat a 2-quart casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray.
Step 2: Place rice, sugar, and salt in the casserole dish; stir in milk and vanilla.
Step 3: Bake, uncovered, in preheated oven for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, stirring every 20 minutes. Let stand for 30 minutes. Sprinkle top with cinnamon.
